info.name: Hacker News - Bluish Gray (2020)
info.description:
Bluish Gray Hacker News. I recommend installing it with Stylus.

GitHub Repository - Feel free to collaborate!
UserCSS - Install the UserCSS style (which supports automatic updates and customization)

Check out my other style - Dark Google Calendar Hit me up with any hints if something could be improved
